root.description: OverviewiBomber Defense is a sequel to the iBomber games; it is developed by Cobra Mobile Ltd. and published by Chillingo Ltd. This title was released on the iTunes store for iOS and Mac, later via Steam with Steamplay and Steam Achievements support, and also on PlayStation Mobile.The game takes place in a variety of locations worldwide, and has the player using machine guns, cannons and anti-aircraft to defeat opponents.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS:Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8Processor:1.5GhZMemory:512 MB RAMGraphics:OpenGL compatible.
